My website (I know, it's a template. But I don't do front-end web dev)

GitHub Twitter Discord: NdT3#0717 Website Status Page

About

I am a 16 year old developer from South Africa who usually does website back-end codes in PHP. Recently I have changed to looking for other languages and have found Node.js. I am currently busy with a few projects in Node.js including a bot for Discord (The chat app for gamers) and trying to make a web server using Node.js for times when a full LAMP stack is too much (example of a case like this: static site)

Projects

I have done a few projects. These are listed in the table below. My web design projects are not included as I have not made them myself, I usually use templates for my websites

Project Description
NdT3 Discord Bot A Discord (Chat app for gamers) bot with moderation features. My first open source project.
Node.JS Web Server Proxy This is just simple code to give people an idea for how to run a web server with multiple domains using a proxy made with Node.JS. Not intended for production
Node.JS Random Number Between - On GitHub / On NPM A simple Node.JS module for generating random numbers between two numbers. Can generate multiple random numbers. Returns results in array
Node.JS Static File Web Server A simple Node.JS module for generating random numbers between two numbers. Can generate multiple random numbers. Returns results in array
Node.JS Static File Web Server A simple Node.JS module for generating random numbers between two numbers. Can generate multiple random numbers. Returns results in array

Projects not ready for use are not included.
